title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-5.4 - Reports of appointment of real property appraisers; application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-5.4 - Reports of appointment of real property appraisers; application

State Regulations
A county director shall notify ORPTS within 15 days after
learning from the clerk of a local government or county clerk that a real
property appraiser has been appointed. The report shall set forth the name of
the local government, the name and address of the appraiser and the date that
his or her term of office commences or commenced. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8188-5.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
